scssToCssPlus.compile.title: Compile SCSS to CSS
scssToCssPlus.configuration.title: SCSS to CSS Plus
scssToCssPlus.outDir.description: Output directory for CSS files. If null, outputs to the same directory as the SCSS file.
scssToCssPlus.generateSourceMap.descript: Generate source maps for the compiled CSS.
scssToCssPlus.minify.description: Minify the compiled CSS using CSSNano.
scssToCssPlus.autoCompile.description: Automatically compile SCSS files on save.
scssToCssPlus.browserslist.description: Browserslist configuration for Autoprefixer. Define target browsers like ['> 1%', 'last 2 versions'].
